Name: Summary of contents
Dataset 1: 1) Resting state functional connectivity matrix (.mat file)2) Participant demographics3) README (with MRI protocols)
Dataset 2: 1) Brain imaging dataset (NIFTI)– rsfmri, T1w, fieldmap2) Participant demographics3) README4) MRI protocols5) QC results
Dataset 3: 1) Brain imaging dataset (NIFTI)– rsfmri, T1w, fieldmap2) Participant demographics3) README4) MRI protocols5) QC results
Dataset 4: 1) Brain imaging dataset (NIFTI with BIDS)– rsfmri, T1w, fieldmap2) Participant demographica3) README4) MRI protocols5) QC results

Name: MRI
Dataset 1: Each consortium site generated one.mat file containing the values of functional connectivity for each participant [number of participants × number of functional connectivities]
Dataset 2: Each of 1,627 subject folders contains- rsfmri (resting-state fMRI EPI images)- t1 (T1-weighted structural image)- fmap (field-map, optional)
Dataset 3: Each of 1,410 subject folders contains- rsfmri (resting-state fMRI EPI images)- t1 (T1-weighted structural image)- fmap (field-map, optional)
Dataset 4: Each of 143 session folders contain- func (resting-state fMRI EPI images)- anat (T1-weighted structural image)- fmap (field-map, optional)

Name: Demographics
Dataset 1: subject ID, age, sex, handedness, diagnosis, auxiliary demographic information, rate of excluded volume, number of excluded volume
Dataset 2: subject ID, age, sex, handedness, diagnosis, auxiliary demographic information
Dataset 3: subject ID, age, sex, handedness, diagnosis, auxiliary demographic information
Dataset 4: BIDS ID, subject ID, site, number of repetitions, phase encoding, MRI manufacturer, number of coils, scanner, session id, sex, age
